name: Store Lunch Widget
author: Gary McKnight

sections.description: This widgets rips the HTML from the targeted Order Lunches At Work menu and uses that to find and display what is for lunch today.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Get the variables from the URL by going to your_subdomain.orderlunchesatwork.com “Order” > “View Menu”
  4. Plug URLs in to widget.
sections.faq:
= Are You Going to Update This?=

Probably not.

=Why Doesn’t My Widget Look Like The Screenshot?=

That’s a screenshot from my site, which has styling for the widgets in it’s css. I didn’t include any styling with the widget itself. You’re free to do whatever you want with it. Be creative. Make it pink or something.

description: This widgets rips the HTML from the targeted Order Lunches At Work menu and uses that to find and display what is for lunch today.
